title: Google releases Android N beta to everyone – here's how to get it | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Android
N](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)

**We learnt a lot more about Android N at Google I/O 2016. What’s new? Let’s
take a look.**

Google continued to tease its forthcoming Android N operating system at its
annual I/O developer conference, saying that its next mobile OS will offer
improved performance, more robust security, VR support and…a name chosen by
its own users.

We’d all been waiting to hear Google reveal the dessert-themed moniker of
Android N, but in the end it opted to open the floodgates and let the public
vote for the new system’s name. You can have your say
[here.](https://www.android.com/versions/name-n/)

**Related:[Everything Google announced at I/O
2016](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/google-io-2016-news-what-to-
expect)**

Elsewhere among the 250-odd new features coming to Android N, Google talked up
some of its performance improvements.

These include support for Vulkan, a cross-platform 3D graphics and compute
module that will allow for more sophisticated gaming as well as being 30-60%
faster on standard applications.

**Related:[What is Vulkan?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/what-is-
vulkan)**

## Latest

  * [ ![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-placeholder-3.svg) Credit: Photo by Raúl Nájera on Unsplash

elections-2018-3613635 "How to vote in the US midterms 2018: Alexa has the
answer")

  * [ ![Twitter Trump](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-placeholder-3.svg) Credit: @lgbtfeedla 

### Twitter gives users more power to report fakers, as purge continues

](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/twitter-is-giving-users-more-power-to-
report-fake-accounts-as-purge-continues-3613624 "Twitter gives users more
power to report fakers, as purge continues")

  *   * [ ![Amazon Echo Dot \(3rd Gen\) 1 hero](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it

](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-
echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to
enable it")

  * 

And it reminded us about some of Android N’s new multitasking features, such
as Picture in Picture mode.

Android N will also offer support for Google’s new Daydream VR platform and,
last but certainly not least, Google announced that the Android N beta release
candidate is available now.

What does that actually mean? In exiting preview mode, Google is basically
saying that Android N is now stable enough to use, so you can download it on
your primary device (provided it’s a Nexus) as opposed to relegating it to a
secondary gadget.

**Related:[How to install Android N
today](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/how-to-install-android-n-right-
now)**

You can learn more about Android N by watching the video below.

**Watch Now: Android N hands-on**

****

What Android N feature are you most looking forward to? Let us know in the
comments below.
